subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit his 17th homer, and Clay Buchholz won his fourth straight start to give the host Boston Red Sox their fifth win in six games, 7-5, against the Miami Marlins on Tuesday.
snippet: David Ortiz hit his 17th homer, and Clay Buchholz won his fourth straight start to give the host Boston Red Sox their fifth win in six games, 7-5, against the Miami Marlins on Tuesday.
